mapper.select: SELECT up.USERS_PROGRESS_NUMBER, up.UNO, up.CLASS_NUMBER, up.COMPLETION_STATUS, up.COMPLETION_RATE, up.PROGRESS_UPDATE_TIME, v.TITLE, v.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM USERS_PROGRESS up JOIN CLASS_WITH_INSTRUCTOR v ON up.CLASS_NUMBER = v.CLASS_NUMBER WHERE up.UNO = #{uno} ORDER BY up.PROGRESS_UPDATE_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS_PROGRESS (USERS_PROGRESS_NUMBER, UNO, CLASS_NUMBER, COMPLETION_STATUS, COMPLETION_RATE, PROGRESS_UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (USERS_PROGRESS_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uno}, #{classNumber}, 1, 0, SYSDATE)
